title: China Calls New Zealand's Spy Report Claims "Entirely Baseless"
content: China insisted Thursday it did not pose a threat to New Zealand's national security after the country's spy service singled out Beijing-backed groups as a "complex intelligence concern".
summary: China insisted Thursday it did not pose a threat to New Zealand's national security after the country's spy service singled out Beijing-backed groups as a "complex intelligence concern".

title: Biden Expresses Concerns About People's Safety In Bangladesh With PM Modi
content: In his call with Prime Minister Narendra Modi last week, US President Joe Biden expressed his concerns about the safety of people in Bangladesh and the future of democratic institutions there, the White House has said.
summary: In his call with Prime Minister Narendra Modi last week, US President Joe Biden expressed his concerns about the safety of people in Bangladesh and the future of democratic institutions there, the White House has said.

title: Elon Musk Says Must Vote For Trump As "Civilization As We Know It On Line"
content: In yet another endorsement of Republican candidate Donald Trump, tech billionaire Elon Musk said the former US president must win if the American people want to "preserve freedom and meritocracy".
summary: In yet another endorsement of Republican candidate Donald Trump, tech billionaire Elon Musk said the former US president must win if the American people want to "preserve freedom and meritocracy".

title: US Welcomes Role Of Any Nation To Help End Ukraine Conflict: White House
content: The US welcomes any nation that is willing to try to help end the conflict in Ukraine, White House national security communications adviser John Kirby has said.
summary: The US welcomes any nation that is willing to try to help end the conflict in Ukraine, White House national security communications adviser John Kirby has said.

title: Israel Will Not Leave Gaza Border Corridor Until...: Netanyahu
content: Israeli PM Benjamin Netanyahu said on Wednesday that Israel will only agree to a permanent ceasefire in Gaza that guarantees the border area between southern Gaza and Egypt could never be used as a lifeline for the Islamist movement Hamas.
summary: Israeli PM Benjamin Netanyahu said on Wednesday that Israel will only agree to a permanent ceasefire in Gaza that guarantees the border area between southern Gaza and Egypt could never be used as a lifeline for the Islamist movement Hamas.

title: Hamas Sees No Need For New Gaza Ceasefire Talks, Urges Pressure On Israel
content: Hamas said on Thursday there was no need for new ceasefire proposals for Gaza and pressure should be put on Israel to agree to a U.S. plan that the Islamist group had already accepted.
summary: Hamas said on Thursday there was no need for new ceasefire proposals for Gaza and pressure should be put on Israel to agree to a U.S. plan that the Islamist group had already accepted.

title: US's Georgia School Shooter Was 14-Year-old Student: Police
content: The perpetrator of a shooting at a US high school on Wednesday was a 14-year-old student and two of the four people killed were fellow pupils, authorities said.
summary: The perpetrator of a shooting at a US high school on Wednesday was a 14-year-old student and two of the four people killed were fellow pupils, authorities said.

title: Netanyahu Says Hamas "Rejected Everything" In Gaza Truce Talks
content: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said on Wednesday that Hamas had rejected all elements of a proposal for a ceasefire in Gaza that would help facilitate the release of hostages.
summary: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said on Wednesday that Hamas had rejected all elements of a proposal for a ceasefire in Gaza that would help facilitate the release of hostages.

title: Trump Calls Georgia School Shooter "Sick And Deranged Monster"
content: Republican US presidential candidate Donald Trump said Wednesday the perpetrator of a high school shooting in Georgia that killed at least four people was a "sick and deranged monster."
summary: Republican US presidential candidate Donald Trump said Wednesday the perpetrator of a high school shooting in Georgia that killed at least four people was a "sick and deranged monster."

title: US Must End Gun Violence "Epidemic": Kamala Harris After Georgia Shooting
content: Democratic presidential candidate Kamala Harris on Wednesday implored Americans to bring a halt to the "epidemic of gun violence" plaguing the United States, after a mass shooting at a Georgia high school left four people dead.
summary: Democratic presidential candidate Kamala Harris on Wednesday implored Americans to bring a halt to the "epidemic of gun violence" plaguing the United States, after a mass shooting at a Georgia high school left four people dead.

title: Putin Was Aware Of Russian Election Interference: White House
content: Russian President Vladimir Putin was aware of actions by state-funded news outlet RT to influence the 2024 US presidential election, the White House said on Wednesday.
summary: Russian President Vladimir Putin was aware of actions by state-funded news outlet RT to influence the 2024 US presidential election, the White House said on Wednesday.

title: Priti Patel Eliminated From Tory Leadership Race In 1st Round Of Voting
content: The UK's Conservative Party leadership candidate Priti Patel has been eliminated from the contest after the first round of voting.
summary: The UK's Conservative Party leadership candidate Priti Patel has been eliminated from the contest after the first round of voting.

title: "Pure Rubbish": Russian Lawmaker On US Election Meddling Claims
content: Russian lawmaker Maria Butina said on Wednesday that reported US claims that Russia was trying to influence the 2024 election were nonsense and that Moscow felt that the only winner of the election would be the US military-industrial complex.
summary: Russian lawmaker Maria Butina said on Wednesday that reported US claims that Russia was trying to influence the 2024 election were nonsense and that Moscow felt that the only winner of the election would be the US military-industrial complex.

title: Justin Trudeau Weakened After Key Sikh Ally Withdraws Support
content: Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau suffered an unexpected blow on Wednesday when the small political party helping keep his minority Liberal government in power withdrew its support.
summary: Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau suffered an unexpected blow on Wednesday when the small political party helping keep his minority Liberal government in power withdrew its support.

title: Gaza Musician Sings For Children Enduring Daily Horrors Of War
content: Braving the constant threat of airstrikes and bombings, 15-year-old Youssef Saad, a Gazan oud player, rides his bicycle through the war-ravaged streets of northern Gaza's Jabalia refugee camp, his instrument strapped to his back.
summary: Braving the constant threat of airstrikes and bombings, 15-year-old Youssef Saad, a Gazan oud player, rides his bicycle through the war-ravaged streets of northern Gaza's Jabalia refugee camp, his instrument strapped to his back.

title: Rome's Ancient Arch Of Constantine Damaged By Lightning
content: Rome's ancient Arch of Constantine was hit by lightning during a heavy storm, causing some fragments to fall off, an official said Wednesday.
summary: Rome's ancient Arch of Constantine was hit by lightning during a heavy storm, causing some fragments to fall off, an official said Wednesday.

title: Meta Clears Use Of Palestinian Slogan "From The River To The Sea"
content: Meta's Oversight Board ruled on Wednesday that the standalone use of the phrase "From the River to the Sea," a slogan oft-used by pro-Palestinian users, does not violate the company's content policies.
summary: Meta's Oversight Board ruled on Wednesday that the standalone use of the phrase "From the River to the Sea," a slogan oft-used by pro-Palestinian users, does not violate the company's content policies.

title: 'Digital Pause': France Pilots Mobile Phone Ban In Schools
content: Tens of thousands of pupils in France are going through a slightly different return to school this autumn, deprived of their mobile phones.
summary: Tens of thousands of pupils in France are going through a slightly different return to school this autumn, deprived of their mobile phones.

title: "I Am Evil": UK Baby Killer Lucy Letby's Confession Notes Were Part Of...
content: Letby was convicted in 2023 for the murder of seven babies and the attempted murder of six others, including two attempts on one child.
summary: Letby was convicted in 2023 for the murder of seven babies and the attempted murder of six others, including two attempts on one child.

title: At Least 4 Dead In School Shooting In US's Georgia, Suspect, 14, Arrested
content: At least four people have died after a gunman opened fire at a high school in US's Georgia. Police and medics rushed to the school and the neighbourhood was put under "a hard lockdown". The suspect is now arrested.
summary: At least four people have died after a gunman opened fire at a high school in US's Georgia. Police and medics rushed to the school and the neighbourhood was put under "a hard lockdown". The suspect is now arrested.
